entries.title: Alarmed by A.I. Chatbots, Universities Start Revamping How They Teach
entries.description: With the rise of the popular new chatbot ChatGPT, colleges are restructuring some courses and taking preventive measures.

entries.title: Lawyers Barred by Madison Square Garden Found a Way Back In
entries.description: MSG Entertainment resorted to facial recognition technology to kick out legal foes, but some have undermined the ban using a law passed to protect theater critics in 1941.
